        \begin{axis}[%
            at={(0.25cm,4.75cm)},
            hide axis,
            scale only axis,
            height=0pt,
            width=0pt,
            colormap={reverse viridis}{
                indices of colormap={
                \pgfplotscolormaplastindexof{viridis},...,0 of viridis}
            },
            colorbar horizontal,
            point meta min=0,
            point meta max=50,
            colorbar style={
                width=5cm,
                xtick={50, 25, 0},
            }]
        \end{axis}
        
        \end{tikzpicture}
        \end{document}
